codeanticode.glgraphics
Class GLCamera

java.lang.Object
  codeanticode.glgraphics.GLCamera

public class GLCamera
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements in pure OpenGL a camera object that follows the API of the Obsessive Camera Direction library.
